subtitleNullable: BBC news articles from the 5 major categories offered
descriptionNullable: The dataset contains news article descriptions scraped from various rss feeds belonging to bbc. The dataset can be used for document clustering and classification as the data is labelled with the different news categories. The link code used for scraping the data is [here](https://github.com/TheAlchemistNerd/Document-Clustering-with-Python/blob/main/scraper.py)
title: BBC News Articles
subtitle: BBC news articles from the 5 major categories offered
description: The dataset contains news article descriptions scraped from various rss feeds belonging to bbc. The dataset can be used for document clustering and classification as the data is labelled with the different news categories. The link code used for scraping the data is [here](https://github.com/TheAlchemistNerd/Document-Clustering-with-Python/blob/main/scraper.py)
